full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE SDER MO ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,DPAL RDO RJE STER MO'I SHIN TU BSDUS PA ZHES BYA BA'I GSUNGS RDZOGS SO, ,'DI NI SANGS RGYAS KYI BKA' 'DRIN DRI MA MED PA BYIN RLABS PHAN YON TSAD MED YIN @003B THE TSOM MI DGOS SO, ,RVA SGRENG NO MONG HANG GYIS SER THEG CHEN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI DAM PA'I MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,
